channel.title: Xp help
channel.description: when u train can someone tell me how too lower exp gave from object's etc

item.title: Xp help
item.dc:creator: @ch33s3b011 ch33s3b011
item.description:
@ch33s3b011 wrote:

this is as ez as it get’s, type in the object id in search in notepad, the find this, for instance a dummy

case 823:
if (actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You punch the dummy and recieve attack xp!”);
setAnimation(0x326);
addSkillXP((300playerLevel[0]), 0);
addSkillXP((300playerLevel[3]), 3);
actionTimer = 50;
}
break;

the addskill xp where it says 300, is the rate, this is fairly slow, it’s a hellzend rate. change the 300 down for less xp per click and up for more xp.

Read full topic

item.title: Xp help
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

search for the message u get in client.java from the object…then you should see something like ??* the ??'s are the number of xp u get each click…the number before the “*”

Read full topic
